item.title: Security
item.description: Kubernetes RBAC Install the requisite Operator RBAC resources, as a Kubernetes cluster admin user, by running a Makefile target: make installrbac This script creates the following RBAC resources on your Kubernetes cluster: Setting Definition Custom Resource Definitions pgbackups pgclusters pgpolicies pgreplicas pgtasks pgupgrades Cluster Roles pgopclusterrole pgopclusterrolecrd scheduler-sa Cluster Role Bindings pgopclusterbinding pgopclusterbindingcrd scheduler-sa Service Account scheduler-sa postgres-operator pgo-backrest scheduler-sa Roles pgo-role pgo-backrest-role Role Bindings pgo-backrest-role-binding Operator RBAC The conf/postgresql-operator/pgorole file is read at start up time when the operator is deployed to the Kubernetes cluster.
